metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22941 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt in versions before 3002.8,3003.4, 3004.1. When configured as a Master-of-Masters, with apublisher_acl, if a user configured in the publisher_acl targets any minionconnected to the Syndic, the Salt Master incorrectly interpreted no validtargets as valid, allowing configured users to target any of the minionsconnected to the syndic with their configured commands. This requires asyndic master combined with publisher_acl configured on theMaster-of-Masters, allowing users specified in the publisher_acl to bypasspermissions, publishing authorized commands to any configured minion.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
